message: So android is caching the locations you've been to by wifi access point or cell info.
and not to forget the android app itself (for rooted devices): https://market.android.com/details?id=ch.rrelmy.android.locationcachemap
crowdflow.net collects all of this data to visualize how people travel around the world.
The same is done for iPhone data here: https://github.com/markolson/js-sqlite-map-thing
I quickly threw together a small sinatra app which can display your locations on Google Maps: http://android-loc-map.heroku.com/
and the raw-data parser writte in python can be found here: https://github.com/packetlss/android-locdump
